## Big thanks

Thank you very much for giving me such a special interview opportunity. I will never forget the intense but meaningful development time lasted 4 days. Hope you enjoy my work as I do. For more fun, please try another iOS game made by me, [7 Light Year](appsto.re/us/A3Ki9.i).
